attributes.action: Pensioners paying Tax on their Pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that people work for 65 years, paying Tax and then when it comes to them receiving their pension, they then pay Tax again! So it works out that they are paying double the amount of tax on one income. 
Pensioners should get a Tax free Pension. They deserve it after living 60 odd years in this Country! I'm only 19 and I can see where this Country is going wrong.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
